## COOCOOK TEMPLATES

### Template 1: Romantic Anniversary Dinner

**Description:** Create a memorable anniversary celebration at home

**Setup:**
- Service Type: Private Dinner
- Duration: 3 hours
- Guest Count: 2
- Budget: $200-$300

**Chef Brief:**
```
We're celebrating our 5th wedding anniversary!
We want an elegant, romantic 3-course meal.

Dietary Requirements: None
Preferences: French cuisine, candlelit ambiance
Budget: $250
Date: [Saturday evening, 6-9pm]

Special Requests:
- Can you provide candlelit ambiance tips?
- No shellfish (partner is allergic)
- Vegetarian appetizer option?

Communication: Message us 24hrs before to confirm menu
```

**Menu Example (for reference):**
1. Appetizer: Escargot or Vegetable Terrine
2. Main: Coq au Vin (beef alternative) with seasonal vegetables
3. Dessert: Chocolate Souffl√© with fresh berries

**Budget Breakdown:**
- Chef fees: $200
- Ingredients: $50-$100 (they source)
- Tip: $30-$50
- **Total: $280-$350**

**Tips for Success:**
- Book 2-3 weeks ahead for best chefs
- Specify wine preferences
- Clean kitchen thoroughly beforehand
- Set table before chef arrives

---

### Template 2: Corporate Executive Lunch

**Description:** Impress clients with professional catering

**Setup:**
- Service Type: Catering
- Duration: 2 hours
- Guest Count: 8
- Budget: $500-$800

**Chef Brief:**
```
Corporate lunch for executive team.

Attendees: 8 people (mix of C-suite executives)
Date: Thursday, 12-2pm
Location: Conference room (kitchen access limited)
Budget: $600

Special Requirements:
- 2 guests are vegetarian
- 1 guest is gluten-free
- Professional presentation (this matters!)
- Lunch should be elegant but efficient
- Can prep in our office kitchen

Timing: Ready to serve at 12:00pm sharp
Cleanup: We'll handle it

Menu Ideas: Gourmet sandwiches, salads, fruit, desserts
OR: Hot entr√©e with sides (your choice)
```

**Budget Breakdown:**
- Chef/catering: $450
- High-quality ingredients: $100-$150
- Tip: $50-$75
- **Total: $600-$675**

**Tips for Success:**
- Confirm setup area/kitchen access week before
- Clear your schedule for 2 hours
- Have someone assigned to greet chef
- Ask for premium presentation (worth the cost)

---

### Template 3: Cooking Class Experience

**Description:** Learn new culinary skills in your home

**Setup:**
- Service Type: Cooking Class
- Duration: 2.5 hours
- Guest Count: 4-6 people
- Budget: $300-$400

**Chef Brief:**
```
We want to learn Italian cooking from a pro!

Group Size: 5 friends, all beginners
Date: Saturday afternoon, 2-4:30pm
Location: Our home kitchen
Budget: $350

What we want to learn:
- Making fresh pasta from scratch
- Authentic Italian sauce (2 variations)
- Wine pairing basics
- Plating/presentation

Special needs: 1 person is vegan (can adapt?)
Skill level: Complete beginners - be patient!
Fun factor: Important! We want to laugh and learn

Can we take photos for social media? (Yes/No preference?)
Will you provide the ingredients or should we buy?
```

**Budget Breakdown:**
- Chef instructor: $250
- Premium ingredients: $75
- Tip: $25-$40
- **Total: $350-$365**

**Tips for Success:**
- Pick a weekend when you're relaxed
- Invite friends who actually want to cook
- Have ingredients prepped if you're buying
- Ask permission before filming/sharing

## SNS AUTO TEMPLATES

### Template 4: Product Launch Post

**Use for:** Announcing a new product/service

**Caption Template:**

```
üöÄ WE'RE EXCITED TO ANNOUNCE...

[Product Name] is officially here!

After months of development and testing,
we're thrilled to share what we've created.

üéØ What it does:
‚Üí [Main benefit 1]
‚Üí [Main benefit 2]
‚Üí [Main benefit 3]

üí° Why it matters:
[1-2 sentences on transformation/impact]

üëâ Ready to try it?
[Link or CTA]

Questions? Drop them in comments!

#ProductLaunch #Innovation #[YourNiche]
#[YourBrand] #Excited
```

**Image Ideas:**
- Product hero shot
- Team holding/using product
- Before/after comparison
- Animated graphic showing benefits

**Best Times to Post:**
- Tuesday-Thursday, 1-3pm
- Monday morning (get ahead of week)

**Hashtag Strategy:**
- 3 niche hashtags (#yourproduct related)
- 3 trending hashtags (what's popular now)
- 2 branded hashtags (#yourcompany)

### Template 5: Customer Testimonial Post

**Use for:** Building social proof, showing real results

**Caption Template:**

```
"[Quote from customer]"

That's what [Customer Name] told us after
using [Your Product/Service].

[Customer Name] is a [their role/business type]
and was struggling with [problem they had].

Here's what changed for them:
‚úì [Result 1]
‚úì [Result 2]
‚úì [Result 3]

Their advice? "[Optional: Additional quote or tip]"

Want similar results? [Link to more info]

#CustomerSuccess #RealResults #[YourNiche]
#ThankYou #CaseStudy
```

**Image Ideas:**
- Headshot of customer smiling
- Customer using your product
- Before/after results
- Team with customer (if permission granted)

**Pro Tips:**
- Always get permission before posting
- Use real names (more credible than "John S.")
- Include specific metrics when possible
- Offer incentive (credit, mention) for permission

---

1Ô∏è‚É£ [Tip 1 - headline]
   [1 sentence explanation]

   [1 sentence explanation]

3Ô∏è‚É£ [Tip 3 - headline]
   [1 sentence explanation]

4Ô∏è‚É£ [Tip 4 - headline]
   [1 sentence explanation]

5Ô∏è‚É£ [Tip 5 - headline]
   [1 sentence explanation]

#Tips #Hacks #[YourNiche]

**Format Variations:**

**Expected Engagement:** High! Educational posts perform 3x better

### Template 7: Behind-the-Scenes Post

**Use for:** Building connection, showing company culture

**Caption Template:**

```
üé• BEHIND THE SCENES at [Company Name]

Ever wondered what goes on when you're not looking?
Here's a sneak peek! üëÄ

[Brief description of what people see in image/video]

This is [person's name] [their role], and they're
[what they're doing in the photo].

Fun fact: [Interesting tidbit about your process/culture]

What happens behind the scenes of your work?
Share in the comments! üëá

#BehindTheScenes #TeamVibes #Transparent
#[YourBrand] #Culture #StartupLife
```

**Image Ideas:**
- Team members working
- Office/workspace tour
- Work-in-progress products
- Team meeting or brainstorm
- Candid moments (genuine, not staged)

**Pro Tips:**
- Show real moments (imperfection is authentic)
- Get team permission before posting
- Humanize your brand
- People connect with people, not logos

### Template 8: Trending Topic Reaction Post

**Use for:** Staying relevant, joining conversations

**Caption Template:**

```
[TOPIC NAME]: Here's what we're thinking ü§î

You've probably seen the [trending topic] in the news.

Here's our take: [Your perspective on topic]

[2-3 sentences on your opinion/expertise]

This connects to our mission because:
‚Üí [How it relates to your business]

What's your take? üëá

#[TrendingTopic] #HotTake #Opinion
#[YourNiche] #Relevant
```

**Real Example:**
```
AI ETHICS: Here's what we're thinking ü§î

You've probably seen the debates about AI
safety in the news.

Here's our take: We believe AI should enhance
human creativity, not replace it. That's why
we built AI Automation to help you FOCUS on
what matters, not to eliminate jobs.

This connects to our mission because we're
building tools that make work easier, not scarier.

What's your take? üëá
```

**Pro Tips:**
- Join conversations, don't start fights
- Be respectful of different views
- Wait for clarity before commenting (avoid misinformation)
- Position your company as thoughtful leader

## REVIEW CAMPAIGN TEMPLATES

### Template 11: Food Product Campaign

**Campaign Name:** "[Product Name] - Taste Tester Campaign"

**Campaign Description:**

```
We're launching [Product Name] and need honest
feedback from food lovers!

We're looking for 20 passionate reviewers who:
‚úì Love [product type: snacks, drinks, etc.]
‚úì Have an engaged audience (food/lifestyle niche)
‚úì Provide thoughtful, honest reviews
‚úì Don't shy away from constructive criticism

Here's what you get:
‚Üí Free [Product Name] for 30 days (retail value $150)
‚Üí $100 cash incentive
‚Üí Recognition on our website + social media
‚Üí Exclusive access to our community

Timeline:
- Now: Apply + get selected
- [Date]: Products arrive at your door
- [Date]: Testing period (test at your own pace)
- [Date]: Submit review (5-10 minute survey)
- [Date+7]: Get paid!

Ready? Click apply below! üëá

[APPLY BUTTON]
```

**Reviewer Requirements:**
- 5K+ followers/subscribers (any platform)
- Active engagement with audience
- Previous reviews (2+ completed)
- 4.5+ quality rating

**Success Metrics:**
- 50+ total reviews/mentions
- 300+ hours of reach
- 5.0 average rating
- Minimum cost per review: $15

## AI AUTOMATION WORKFLOWS

### Template 14: Email to Slack Notification

**Trigger:** Email arrives with specific keyword
**Action:** Send Slack message to team

**Setup Instructions:**
```
1. Trigger: Email Received
   ‚îî‚îÄ From: Any
   ‚îî‚îÄ Subject contains: "urgent" OR "critical"
   ‚îî‚îÄ Body: (leave blank)

2. Action: Send Slack Message
   ‚îî‚îÄ Channel: #alerts
   ‚îî‚îÄ Message:
      "üö® URGENT EMAIL RECEIVED
       From: {{ email.from }}
       Subject: {{ email.subject }}
       Preview: {{ email.body | first 200 chars }}

       üîó [View in Gmail]({{ email.url }})"

3. Save & Test
```

**Use Cases:**
- Critical customer issues
- Support tickets
- Finance alerts
- Executive requests

**Time Saved:** 5 minutes per email √ó 5 emails/day = 25 min/week

---

### Template 15: Form Submission ‚Üí CRM + Email

**Trigger:** Website form submitted
**Action:** Add to CRM + Send welcome email

**Setup Instructions:**
```
1. Trigger: Form Submission
   ‚îî‚îÄ Form: Contact Form (or your form)

2. Action #1: Create CRM Contact
   ‚îî‚îÄ First Name: {{ form.first_name }}
   ‚îî‚îÄ Last Name: {{ form.last_name }}
   ‚îî‚îÄ Email: {{ form.email }}
   ‚îî‚îÄ Company: {{ form.company }}
   ‚îî‚îÄ Notes: {{ form.message }}

3. Action #2: Send Email
   ‚îî‚îÄ To: {{ form.email }}
   ‚îî‚îÄ Subject: "Welcome! Here's what's next"
   ‚îî‚îÄ Body:
      "Hi {{ form.first_name }},

       Thanks for reaching out! We received your
       inquiry and will respond within 24 hours.

       In the meantime, check out:
       ‚Üí [Link 1]
       ‚Üí [Link 2]

       Questions? Reply to this email.

       Cheers,
       [Your Name]"

4. Save & Publish
```

**Use Cases:**
- Lead generation
- Support requests
- Event signups
- Demo requests

**Time Saved:** 2 minutes per form √ó 20 forms/week = 40 min/week

### Template 16: Daily Digest Report

**Trigger:** Every weekday at 9am
**Action:** Send email with daily metrics

**Setup Instructions:**
```
1. Trigger: Schedule
   ‚îî‚îÄ Frequency: Every weekday
   ‚îî‚îÄ Time: 9:00 AM EST

2. Action: Send Email
   ‚îî‚îÄ To: team@company.com
   ‚îî‚îÄ Subject: "Daily Digest - {{ now | date: "MMM dd" }}"
   ‚îî‚îÄ Body:
      "Good morning team!

       üìä YESTERDAY'S METRICS:

       Traffic: {{ metrics.pageviews }} pageviews
       Signups: {{ metrics.new_signups }} new signups
       Revenue: ${{ metrics.revenue_yesterday }}
       Support Tickets: {{ metrics.tickets_open }}

       Top Performing Page:
       {{ metrics.top_page.title }}
       ({{ metrics.top_page.views }} views)

       Have a great day! üí™"

3. Save & Publish
```

**Use Cases:**
- Daily standup automation
- KPI tracking
- Team communication
- Investor updates

**Time Saved:** 15 minutes daily = 1.25 hours/week

### Template 17: Customer Payment ‚Üí Invoice + Thank You

   ‚îî‚îÄ Customer: {{ payment.customer_name }}

   ‚îî‚îÄ To: {{ payment.customer_email }}
   ‚îî‚îÄ Subject: "Thank you for your purchase!"

       ${{ payment.amount }}.

## WEBAPP BUILDER TEMPLATES

### Template 18: Local Business Website

**Template:** Service Business Template

**Setup:**
1. Choose template ‚Üí Local Service Business
2. Customize sections:
   - Hero: "[Business Name] - Your [Service] Expert"
   - Services: List your 3-5 main services
   - About: Your story, years in business
   - Testimonials: Client success stories
   - Gallery: Before/after photos
   - Pricing: Service packages
   - Contact: Form + address + phone

**Customization Checklist:**
- [ ] Add business logo
- [ ] Upload high-quality photos (your work)
- [ ] Write compelling service descriptions
- [ ] Add real testimonials from clients
- [ ] Set up contact form
- [ ] Add Google Maps embed
- [ ] Create booking/consultation page
- [ ] Set SEO titles/descriptions
- [ ] Connect Google Analytics

**Expected Results:**
- 50+ monthly visitors (after 3 months)
- 5-10 qualified leads/month
- 3-5 conversions/month

## HOW TO USE THESE TEMPLATES

### Step 1: Choose Template
Pick one that matches your goal

### Step 2: Copy Content
Copy/paste the template structure

### Step 3: Customize
Replace [BRACKETS] with your info

### Step 4: Personalize
Add your voice, style, unique angle

### Step 5: Test
Review for typos, broken links, clarity

### Step 6: Launch
Publish and monitor results

### Step 7: Optimize
Based on performance, refine next month

## TEMPLATE MODIFICATION TIPS

### Make it Your Own
These are starting points. Good templates are:
- ‚úÖ Customized to your voice
- ‚úÖ Specific to your audience
- ‚úÖ Aligned with your brand
- ‚úÖ Tested and refined

### A/B Testing
- Try 2 versions of caption
- Post on same day/time
- Compare engagement
- Use winner going forward

### Track Performance
- Screenshot engagement metrics
- Note what worked
- Document learnings
- Build your own best practices
